Name: Aegis Redeemer
Description:
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Focus: Gunship 

Designed by Aegis Dynamics, the Redeemer is a powerful fighting ship capable of holding its own in combat with a powerful weapons payload. Dotted with turrets and missiles, the Redeemer also doubles as an armored landing craft capable of delivering soldiers to the frontlines.
